content:
Set Up Einstein Article Recommendations

Einstein Article Recommendations analyzes case and knowledge article fields to determine which articles are most likely to solve a customer inquiry. Agents see recommendations in the Knowledge component of the Lightning Service Console.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions.

Note: Einstein Article Recommendations is being turned on for Lightning Knowledge starting Summer '21.

If your business uses specific case and knowledge fields, customize the model so that Einstein analyzes closed-case data and provides more accurate recommendations. If you don't want Einstein Article Recommendations in your org, turn it off in Setup.

To get started:

* Select languages and fields for your article recommendation model
* Build and activate your article recommendation model
* Give agents access to Einstein Article Recommendations
* Add the Knowledge component to the Lightning Service Console

Let us know if this solved your issue.
title: Setting Up Einstein Article Recommendations in Salesforce
